instructions:
In a 4 quart saucepan combine all ingredients except cheese and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer
for 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Sprinkle each serving with cheddar cheese. Makes 4 pints.
Serves 6. 
*(Rev. 6/27/94)*
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) chili beans in chili gravy
2 3/4 cups frozen diced potatoes with chopped bell peppers and onions (Ore Ida - O'Brien)
1/2 lb Polish Kielbasa quartered lengthwise and sliced 1/4 inch thick
name: Kielbasa And Bean Soup
